DOC.brief_summary: This feasibility study evaluate dual-energy ( DE ) contrast-enhanced ( CE ) digital mammography detect breast cancer patient increase breast density ( BI-RADS category c ) . Eligible patient invite full-field digital mammography dual-energy ( DE ) contrast-enhanced ( CE ) digital mammography compare accuracy image method detection breast cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Study Dual-energy ( DE ) Contrast-enhanced ( CE ) Digital Mammography
DOC.criteria: 1 . Signed informed consent 2 . At least 19 year old 3 . GFR > 60 4 . Heterogeneously extremely dense breast ( BIRADS category c ) . 1 . History iodinate contrast allergy 2 . Pregnant lactating determine routine standard practice 3 . Personal history breast cancer 4 . History prior breast excisional biopsy ( Patients history core needle biopsy exclude ) 5 . History prior breast reduction mammoplasty surgery 6 . History prior breast augmentation surgery 7 . Mental condition render subject unable understand nature , scope , possible consequence study .
